video_prompt: Giant spacecraft glides over a cloud-ringed city. Smaller craft swarm around it. The city lights shimmer and pulse. Clouds shift and swirl, subtly altering light. Distant atmospheric haze subtly changes color across the horizon.
image_prompt: "Massive, dark, futuristic star destroyer or supercarrier flying over a luminous, circular cityscape built within a cloud-filled crater. Aerial view, epic scale, sci-fi grandeur, highly detailed digital art."
refined_video_prompt: A colossal spacecraft glides smoothly, its shadow slowly traversing the city below. Numerous smaller craft actively swarm and orbit the larger vessel. City lights shimmer and pulse with varying intensity. Clouds subtly shift, swirl, and ripple, dynamically altering the interplay of light and shadow across the cityscape. Atmospheric haze gently transitions its color spectrum along the distant horizon.
